name: Bordered
description:
Best played on Wacom-like graphical tablet. Really :)

Turn on your favourite music and dive into Bordered. The gameplay is pretty straightforward: bounce off the walls, dodge red balls and collect energy pieces to be able to jump. However, it becomes really challenging once you get the idea. Have a nice journey!

I was dreaming to make a simple yet beautiful and interesting game and Bordered is the game I'm quite proud of. It's not perfect. There is always a room for improvement, yeah :) But it is the game I like playing and I hope you will, too! I will be glad to have any feedback from you.

Thank Scott Buckley for the awesome music, released under Creative Commons.

For Linux users: you can launch Bordered.love file by using the love2d package. It can be downloaded to any OS from here.
